domainPadding.description:
The domainPadding prop specifies a number of pixels of padding to add to the
beginning and end of a domain. This prop is useful for explicitly spacing ticks farther
from the origin to prevent crowding. This prop should be given as an object with
numbers specified for x and y.

height.description: The height props specifies the height of the chart container element in pixels

padding.description:
The padding props specifies the amount of padding in number of pixels between
the edge of the chart and any rendered child components. This prop can be given
as a number or as an object with padding specified for top, bottom, left
and right.

standalone.description:
The standalone prop determines whether the component will render a standalone svg
or a <g> tag that will be included in an external svg. Set standalone to false to
compose VictoryChart with other components within an enclosing <svg> tag.

width.description: The width props specifies the width of the chart container element in pixels
